song.title: Blooming Heather
song.chorus: Will ye go, Lassie go? And we'll all go together To pull wild mountain thyme All around the blooming heather Will ye go, Lassie go?
song.verse: Oh the summertime is coming And the trees are sweetly blooming And the wild mountain thyme Grows around the blooming heather
I will build my love a tower Near yon' pure crystal fountain And on it I will build All the flowers of the mountain
If my true love she were gone I would surely find another To pull wild mountain thyme Grows around the blooming heather
